articles.title: VA Treats PTSD with Risky Drug Cocktails, Affecting Hundreds of Thousands
articles.description: Hundreds of thousands of veterans with PTSD have been prescribed simultaneous doses of powerful psychiatric drugs, a practice known as 'polypharmacy,' which can lead to severe side effects including numbness, weight gain, and increased suicidal thoughts.

articles.title: Tech Giants Pour Billions Into AI, Propelling Market Caps Past Trillions
articles.description: Major tech companies like Google, Microsoft, Amazon, and Meta are investing nearly $400 billion this year in AI infrastructure, contributing significantly to their market capitalizations and overall U.S. GDP growth.

articles.title: Trump Targets China's Tariff Workaround with New 40% Levy on Transshipments
articles.description: President Trump has imposed a 40% tariff on indirect imports from China, aiming to curb the practice of transshipments through other countries to bypass U.S. tariffs.
